Articles.Content:
I went into the past of the past and you ended up destroying the stasis chamber.

I then returned to the present, chased by a dinosaur. The dinosaur then chases toward the next poster.
I jump onto the dinosaur as it turns out he's my long lost buddy. We ride to victory, about to trample the next poster.

LOL, the last 2 posts remind me of this:

Anyway, the dinosaur steps on me right as I was on top of one of my pitfall traps, so I fall in and you think I am dead. The next poster triggers another one of my traps.

That was the "fast" trap (designed for fast objects) and it tied the poster of comment #152 instead.

The victim then falls toward the next poster.
I have an umbrella! I maroon the next poster on Lathe.

Well, seeing as this "Lathe" place is one that I've never heard of nor one that exists, I am transported back to Earth by a mysterious force.

(It's called Laythe. Get it right )

I drop Minmus on the next poster.
I am in space, so Minimus does not fall. I put the next poster on Jool.

I have a rocket-powered plane.

While flying, my plane crashed onto the next poster. I somehow bailed out and survived...

Jeb, who had secretly hijacked the plane earlier on, flies away from me.

He lands, grabs a baseball bat, shouts "WHERE'S MY MONEY?!?!?!" and begins beating the next poster to death.

I dive roll. Nuff Said.

I then proceed to drop the next poster in the Sun.
You drop me into your son. He gets mad and teams up with Jeb to kill the next poster.

I promise Jeb all the SRBs he could possibly want, and he joins me.

I fire one of the SRBs at the next poster.
ERROR: Because im on the Mun, the SRB missed by 153 miles.
I teleport to the Mun, use a KAS winch to form a giant slingshot, grab the spent SRB, and then sling it at the next poster.
You overestimated the strength needed and the SRB went over me, hitting the next poster.
I use my jet pack to go back to Kerbin. I put the jet pack on the next poster, who does not know how to use it.

Hrm...

*fiddles with the controls*

*Fwoosh!*

WAHOO!!!!

I drop anvils on the next poster. depleted uranium, rocket assisted anvils.

*steps to one side* *explosions*

I unleash danny2462's pet Kraken (the most destructive of them all) and it attacks the next poster.
I apply a dozen tranquilizer darts (just to make sure ), then toss the Kraken at the next poster, while shooting it with the antidote AND stimulants.

I fly into an inter dimensional portal.

I then go on and feed the next poster to pink-skinned animals.
I teleport away and then I teleport Minimus right above the next poster. (Give or take a few kilometers)

I'm standing on Minmus. doing space backflips. (The highest on Minmus is give or take 5 km.)

Then Mikeman teleported so frequently that he "accidentally" crashes to the next poster.
I can't crash into myself . I invent a Kraken Launcher and I use it on the next poster.

I am the kraken.

I call my kraken friends to go tear apart the next poster.

Oh cr....

Before I'm torn apart, I drop a multi-megaton nuke on the next poster.
